nodes.text: Undersecretary to the Assistant Secretary to the Acting Chief of Information for Senator Wren

Undersecretary to the Assistant Secretary to the Acting Chief of Information for Senator Wren was a title held by Horil Damlo, a minor functionary who worked for Senator Lavina Wren during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Damlo often abbreviated the title to UttASttACoIfSW, which he pronounced Oo-tass-tuh-koyf-swuh. He was told that this acronym was, in Shyriiwook, the word for leader. However, this was untrue and the acronym was more close to the Shyriiwook word for tree slug. The title essentially meant that his job was to sit by a door and occasionally run some errands.
